scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version && tsc --pretty --project tsconfig-publish.json && cp -r package.json README.md cdk/resources lib/
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run pac && NAMESPACE=$(whoami | tr '.' '-') cdk deploy
scripts.destroy:dev: npm run clean && NAMESPACE=dev cdk destroy "*"
scripts.destroy: npm run clean && NAMESPACE=$(whoami | tr '.' '-') cdk destroy "*"
scripts.diff: npm run clean && NAMESPACE=$(whoami | tr '.' '-') cdk diff
scripts.synth: npm run clean && NAMESPACE=$(whoami | tr '.' '-') cdk synth
scripts.pac: rimraf assets && mkdir -p assets/get && cp php/handlers/get.php assets/get && cp -r php/vendor assets/get && cd -
scripts.pacx: rimraf assets && mkdir -p assets/ && cd assets && zip get.zip -r ../php/handlers/get.php ../php/vendor && cd -
